successes.title: Duo | Coffee Steeper |
successes.description: Easily brew ridiculously good coffee at home. A dual chamber "twist" on a traditional French press. Big bold taste, no gunk.

Pledges.description: DUO SUPPORTER: Welcome to the Duo family. Receive all project updates and follow along in our quest to bring Duo to life. Plus, a big thank you from all of us!

THE EARLY BIRD: ONE (1) DUO COFFEE STEEPER. Be one of the first 50 to order and receive a special "STEEP" discount price. Choose from any unlocked color option. Also includes a free 1/2 pound of coffee if we reach our stretch goal. Domestic shipping included.
ONE (1) DUO COFFEE STEEPER. Choose from any unlocked color option. Also includes a free 1/2 pound of coffee if we reach our stretch goal. Domestic shipping included.
ONE (1) DUO COFFEE STEEPER. Choose from grey, red, blue, or the exclusive Kickstarter green. Also includes a free 1/2 pound of coffee if we reach our stretch goal. Domestic shipping included.
